
---
title: '充液系统动力学(八)：自由液面的晃动'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - 科学网
 - 博客
headimg: 'https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/100104zduaak1oissygkaw.png'
author: 科学网
comments: false
date: Thu, 16 Dec 2021 13:45:00 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/100104zduaak1oissygkaw.png'
---

<div>   
<p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-size: 18px;"><strong><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">1.<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     </span></span></strong><strong><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">  </span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">Bernoulli</span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;">积分</span></strong></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体"></span></strong></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">前面讨论的充液系统动力学问题均限于液体在腔内完全充满情形。如不充满就有自由液面出现，在重力或惯性力作用下产生晃动 (<span style="line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">sloshing</span>)。对液体晃动的研究先假定刚体的运动已预先确定，使问题限制在流体力学范畴以内。然后再考虑液体晃动对刚体运动的影响。实际上刚体与液体的运动是相互影响同时发生的，与全充液情况相比，非全充的刚液耦合系统的动力学分析难度明显增加。</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">设 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">V</span></em></span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">  </span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">和 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">V</span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′</span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> 为液体和刚体占据的空间，</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">Σ</span></em></span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">和 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">Σ</span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′ </span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">为腔壁的湿润和非湿润表面，</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">S</span></em></span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">为自由液面（图 1）。</span>刚体内 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">O</span></em></span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">点的速度为</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">v</span></em></strong></span></span><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">0</span></sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，瞬时角速度为 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">ω</span></em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，腔内流场在 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">P</span></em></span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">点处的流速为 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">u</span></em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，则 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">P</span></em></span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">点处质点的绝对速度</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">v</span></em></strong></span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">为</span></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                                    <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/100104zduaak1oissygkaw.png" title alt="晃动1.png" width="203" height="42" style="width: 203px; height: 42px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                                    (1)</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="409" height="339" style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; text-align: center; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal; width: 409px; height: 339px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><br></p><p style="text-align:center;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%;">图 1  带充液腔的刚体</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span><br></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">博文<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 18px;"> “<span style="font-family: 楷体, 楷体_GB2312, SimKai;">充液系统动力学(一)</span>” </span> 中，曾基于分析力学的虚功率原理导出流体动力学方程。若忽略流体的粘性，称为欧拉流体动力学方程：</span><br></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                              <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/100646cc6vjojyhmzf8yvv.png" title alt="晃动2.png" width="402" height="73" style="width: 402px; height: 73px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                      (2)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">将式 <span style="line-height: 150%;">(1) </span>中解出的 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="line-height: 150%;">u</span></em></strong></span><strong><em><span style="line-height: 150%;"> </span></em></strong><span style="line-height: 150%;">代入上式，设无旋流体的速度势函数为</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="line-height: 150%;"> </span><em><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">ϕ</span></em></span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，</span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">作用力<span style="font-family: "times new roman";"> </span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">f<span style="font-family: "times new roman";"> </span></span></em></strong></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">为有势力，以<span style="font-family: "times new roman";"> </span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">U</span></em></span><em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";"> </span></em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">为力函数。令</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">v</span></em></strong></span><strong><em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;"> </span></em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">=</span></em></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;">▽</span></strong><em><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">ϕ</span></em><em><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，</span></em><strong><em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">f = </span></em></strong><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;">▽</span></strong><em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">U</span></em><em><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">，</span></em></span><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">得到</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">        <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/100923tmukiujk2kjjahm2.png" title alt="晃动3.png" width="511" height="77" style="width: 511px; height: 77px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">      (3)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;">直接验算可证明以下关系式成立：</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";">                       <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/101219iun5d32jwnqngdz0.png" title alt="晃动4.png" width="477" height="52" style="width: 477px; height: 52px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                     (4)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">利用上式将方程 (3) 化作</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                 <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/101417bub5u15ouulouwxu.png" title alt="晃动5.png" width="461" height="83" style="width: 461px; height: 83px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                        (5)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">从而导出 <strong>Bernoulli </strong><strong>积分</strong>：</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                        <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/101611bs2c4oa4dav94vc2.png" title alt="晃动6.png" width="407" height="75" style="width: 407px; height: 75px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                (6)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">上式右边的任意时间函数<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>C</em>(<em>t</em>)</span> 可并入左边的势函数<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>ϕ </em></span>而不影响流场的速度分布，可用积分常数 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>C</em></span><em> </em>代替。如流速很小，忽略<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>v</em></span><em> </em>的二次项，简化为</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                                                    <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/101804m8v49xrerheima9h.png" title alt="晃动7.png" width="177" height="65" style="width: 177px; height: 65px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                                 (7)<br></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">式 (6) 或 (7) 也称为 Bernoulli 定理或 Bernoulli 方程。</span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 18px;"><strong>2.<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">  </span></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">     </span></strong><strong>液面的表面张力</strong></span></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;">液体内部的分子引力在界面上表现为<strong>表面张力</strong>。在腔体体积足够大，或流体的体积力足够大的一般情况下可予以忽略。讨论失重或微重状态下的充液刚体运动时，液面的表面张力是不可忽略的因素。</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">自由液面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>S</em></span><em> </em>为液体与气体之间的界面，设液面上单位长度范围内的表面张力为<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>α</em></span>，称为液体与气体之间的<strong>表面张力系数</strong>。在液面 <em><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;">S </em></em>上 的任意点 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>P</em></span><em> </em>处，沿液面主曲率方向取边长为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">d<em>s</em></span><sub>1 </sub>和 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px;">d</span><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;">s</em><sub>2 </sub>的微元弧段组成微元液面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">d<em>σ </em>=  </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px;">d</span><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;">s</em><sub>1</sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px;">d</span><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;">s</em><sub>2</sub>。设液面沿主曲率方向的曲率半径为<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>R</em></span><em><sub>j </sub></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">(<em>j </em>= 1,2)</span>，则弧段 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px;">d</span><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;">s</em><sub>1 </sub>和 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px;">d</span><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;">s</em><sub>2 </sub>相对曲率中心 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>O</em></span><em><sub>j </sub></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">(j = 1,2) </span>的张角为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">φ</span></em></span><em><sub><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">j </span></sub></em><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">= <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px;">d</span><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;">s</em><em><sub>j</sub></em>/<span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; font-size: 20px;"><em>R</em></span><em><sub>j </sub></em><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; font-size: 20px;"><em><sub> </sub></em>(<em>j </em>= 1,2) </span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">（图<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px;"> </span></span><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;">2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">）。</span></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><br></span><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="422" height="442" style="width: 422px; height: 442px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">图 2   弧段 d<em>s</em><sub>1 </sub>和 d<em>s</em><sub>2 </sub>的张角</span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%;"><br></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">在 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>P</em></span><em> </em>点处沿曲面法向取速度变分 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">δ<em>u<sub>n </sub></em>= <strong><em>n</em></strong>·δ<strong><em>u</em></strong></span>，使 <em><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;">P</em></em>点处的微元液面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">d<em>σ </em></span>产生表面张力，与边线的长度变化成正比，导致虚功率增量<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> δ<em>P</em></span>（图 3）：</span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"></span>                                 <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/104135smzt4wmbmftv3550.png" title alt="晃动8.png" width="354" height="39" style="width: 354px; height: 39px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                  (8)<br></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">其中 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>K </em>= (1/<em>R</em><sub>1</sub>)  + (1/<em>R</em><sub>2</sub>) </span>为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>P</em></span><em> </em>点处液面的<strong>曲率</strong>，为主曲率平均值的二倍。将上式在自由液面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>S</em></span><em> </em>范围内积分，积分值仍以<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> δ<em>P</em></span><em> </em>表示：</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                                                 <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/104331t9mi7eip9i9ipmme.png" title alt="晃动9.png" width="185" height="45" style="width: 185px; height: 45px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                            (9)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                   </span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="329" height="448" style="width: 329px; height: 448px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="text-align:center;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";">图 3  法向虚速度产生的表面张力虚功率</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">        在自由液面与刚体腔壁相交的边缘 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>s<sub>c</sub></em></span><em><sub> </sub></em>处，即刚体、液体、气体三种介质的界面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>S</em>,  <em>Σ</em><em>,  Σ</em>′</span> 的公共交线处，除液体与气体界面 <em>S </em>的虚功率增量 (9) 以外，还必须考虑因变分<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> δ<em>u<sub>n </sub></em></span>引起的刚体与液体的界面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Σ</em></span><em> </em>和 刚体与气体的界面 <em>Σ</em>′ 的周边长度变化所产生的虚功率增量。分别以 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>α</em><sub>1</sub><em>, α</em><sub>2</sub></span><sub> </sub>表示刚体与液体、刚体与气体之间的表面张力系数。设在界线<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>s<sub>c </sub></em></span>处，界面 <em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; white-space: normal;">S </em>与 <em><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; white-space: normal;">Σ</em> </em>的法线倾角为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>θ</em></span><em><sub>c</sub></em>，称为<strong>接触角</strong>。从图 4 可看出，虚速度 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify;"> δ</span><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; white-space: normal;">u<sub>n </sub></em>在<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>s<sub>c </sub></em></span>处引起液体与气体、刚体与液体、刚体与气体之间的界线变化分别与<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> δ<em>u<sub>n </sub></em>cot<em>θ<sub>c</sub></em>, δ<em>u<sub>n </sub></em>csc<em>θ<sub>c</sub></em>, -δ<em>u<sub>n </sub></em>csc<em>θ<sub>c </sub></em></span>成正比，所导致的虚功率分别为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>α</em>δ<em>u<sub>n </sub></em>cot<em>θ<sub>c</sub></em>, <em>α</em><sub>1</sub>δ<em>u<sub>n </sub></em>csc<em>θ<sub>c</sub></em>, -<em>α</em><sub>2</sub>δ<em>u<sub>n </sub></em>csc<em>θ<sub>c </sub></em></span>。总的虚功率增量为<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">                                                  <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/104708dcntikazt43tygx9.png" title alt="晃动10.png" width="362" height="49" style="width: 362px; height: 49px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                   (10)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="348" height="286" style="width: 348px; height: 286px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="text-align:center;text-indent:29px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";">图 4   法向虚速度引起界面边界的长度变化</span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="text-indent:29px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">在博文<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 18px;"> “<span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 楷体, 楷体_GB2312, SimKai;">充液系统动力学(一)</span>” </span>中应用虚功率原理列写刚体与液体耦合系统的动力学方程时，若考虑液面的表面张力因素，应将式 (9), (10) 表示的虚功率增量加入此方程，化作</span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">            <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/105108gn2o4b6na6lcc2z4.png" title alt="晃动11.png" width="584" height="158" style="width: 584px; height: 158px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">           (11)<br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">基于变分 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">δ<em>u<sub>n</sub></em></span><em><sub> </sub></em>的任意性，导出考虑表面张力的自由液面边界条件：<br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">                                                <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/105254fzdjjrolwtlpl15b.png" title alt="晃动12.png" width="291" height="105" style="width: 291px; height: 105px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                             (12)<br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 18px;"><strong>3.<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">  </span></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">     </span></strong><strong>液体的静平衡自由液面</strong></span></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="text-indent:29px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">考虑液面的表面张力，将 Bernoulli 积分 (7) 中的压强<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>p</em></span><em> </em>以式 (12) 代入，<em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-indent: 29px;"> </span><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-indent: 29px; white-space: normal;">p</em></em><sub>0 </sub>并入积分常数 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>C</em></span>，力函数 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>U </em></span><em> </em>改以势能的负值<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>-V </em></span>表示，化作</span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong>                                                   <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/105529sa84z88huvah8dlg.png" title alt="晃动13.png" width="289" height="67" style="width: 289px; height: 67px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                           </strong> (13)</span><br></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">设液面<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>S </em></span>处于静止状态，令上式中的速度项 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">∂<em>ϕ</em>/∂<em>t </em>= 0</span> 等于零。利用柱坐标<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> (<em>r</em>,<em> θ, z</em>) </span>表示流场中任意点 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>P </em></span><em> </em>的位置（图 5），微重力场和离心力场的势能分别为</span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;">              <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/110018bsunon7lsnnddqsu.png" title alt="晃动14.png" width="278" height="67" style="width: 278px; height: 67px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">               </span></strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;">(14)</span><strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;"><br></span></strong></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%;"><br></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="383" height="335" style="width: 383px; height: 335px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><br></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">图 5   液体流场的柱坐标<br></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">其中<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>cg</em></span><em> </em>为微重力（地球上<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>c </em>= 1</span>, 太空中 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>c </em>< 1</span>），<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>ω</em></span><sub>0 </sub>为容器绕 <em>z </em>轴的自旋角速度。将式 (14a) 代入式 (13)，选择某个特征长度 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>a</em></span>，化作无量纲形式：</span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"></span>                                                     <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/110649fru8zx2tgzj8jeg4.png" title alt="晃动15.png" width="160" height="31" style="width: 160px; height: 31px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                        (15)<br></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">各无量纲量定义为<br></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">                                             <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/110835rq44skhyapsyzp71.png" title alt="晃动16.png" width="311" height="69" style="width: 311px; height: 69px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                              (16)<br></span></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">其中 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>B </em></span>称为  <strong>Bond 数</strong>，其物理意义为体积力与表面张力之比。表面张力仅当  Bond  数足够大时方允许忽略，此时液面方程 (13) 简化为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>V </em>= const</span>，自由液面为平面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>z </em>= <em>z</em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><sub>0</sub></span></span>（重力场），或圆柱面<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>r </em>= <em>r</em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><sub>0</sub></span></span>（离心力场）。如重力与离心力共同作用，则为旋转抛物面  <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>z </em>= <em>z</em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><sub>0</sub></span>+(<em>ω</em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><sub>0</sub></span></span><sup>2</sup><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">/2<em>cg</em>)<em>r</em></span><sup>2</sup>（图 6）。</span><br></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="451" height="254" style="width: 451px; height: 254px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><br></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><span style="font-size: 16px;">图 6   静平衡自由液面</span><span style="font-size: 14px;"></span></span><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"><br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 18px;"><strong>4.<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">    </span></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">   </span></strong><strong>液体晃动的动力学方程</strong></span></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">设刚体处于静止状态，势能 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>V</em></span><em> </em>仅含微重力场 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>cgz </em></span>。设腔壁相对<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>z</em></span><em> </em>轴对称，液体的平衡液面亦相对<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-indent: 28px;"> </span><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;">z</em><em> </em>轴对称。平衡液面和腔壁的曲面方程分别为</span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong>                                              <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/112159nlrw11vhwm09e5lg.png" title alt="晃动17.png" width="202" height="82" style="width: 202px; height: 82px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                                   (17)</strong></span><br></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">设晃动引起液面高度的摄动规律为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>h</em>(<em>r,</em><em> θ, t</em>)</span>，则受扰液面的曲面方程为（图 7）</span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span>                             <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/112339gry1hbiriazkkzvg.png" title alt="晃动18.png" width="395" height="41" style="width: 395px; height: 41px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                (18)</p><p><br></p><p style="text-align: center;"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="379" height="353" style="width: 379px; height: 353px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><br></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;">图 7   腔体与液面的曲面形状</span><br></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"><br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 24px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">利用曲率 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>K</em></span><em> </em>的计算公式，将式 (17) 代入计算，以下角标<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>f<sub>r</sub></em>, <em><sub> </sub></em><em>h</em><em><sub>r</sub></em>,  <em>h</em><em><sub>θ </sub></em></span>表示 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>f </em></span><em> </em>和 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>h</em></span><em> </em>对 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>r</em></span><em> </em>和<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>θ</em></span><em> </em>的偏导数。仅保留<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>h </em></span>及其导数的一次项，将导出的曲率 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>K</em></span><em> </em>和式 (18) 代入 Bernoulli 方程 (13)，得到自由液面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>S</em></span><em> </em>处的动力学条件：</span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span>                   <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/114537tgsb1tbrj14tahr1.png" title alt="晃动19.png" width="522" height="203" style="width: 522px; height: 203px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                 (19)<br></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">令 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>h </em>= 0</span>，即得到无晃动时考虑表面张力的自由液面平衡条件：</span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span>                                  <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/114735a27i1271j28y4277.png" title alt="晃动20.png" width="336" height="104" style="width: 336px; height: 104px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                        (20)<br></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">从方程 (19) 减去上式，化作扰动 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>h</em>(<em>r,</em><em> θ, t</em>)</span> 的动力学方程： </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">   </span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">             </span><img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/114940r55etmyp56yp20py.png" title alt="晃动21.png" width="667" height="97" style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: center; width: 667px; height: 97px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">(21)      </p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">以<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>F</em>(<em>r,</em><em> θ, </em><em>z, t</em>) = 0 </span>表示腔壁 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Σ </em></span>或液面 <em><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; white-space: normal;">S </em></em>的曲面方程。此曲面法线的<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%; letter-spacing: 0px;">方向</span>余<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">弦</span>为</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                               <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/115137g3kngxly9muxyggm.png" title alt="晃动22.png" width="296" height="76" style="width: 296px; height: 76px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                    (22)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">将上式代入腔壁  <em><em style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; white-space: normal;">Σ  </em></em>或液面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>S </em></span>处无法向位移条件 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>u<sub>n </sub></em>= <strong><em>u</em></strong>·<strong><em>n = </em></strong>0 </span>，得到约束方程：</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                     <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/115434asq1s0yofzf2flzx.png" title alt="晃动23.png" width="325" height="60" style="width: 325px; height: 60px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                      (23)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">其中 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>u<sub>r</sub></em>,  <em>u</em><em><sub>θ</sub></em>,  <em>u<sub>z </sub></em></span>为相对流速 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>u</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong>沿柱坐标的投影：</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                          <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/115935rr18nmjm6m4mmbi1.png" title alt="晃动24.png" width="307" height="59" style="width: 307px; height: 59px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                       (24)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">对于腔壁 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Σ</em></span><em> </em>令 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>F </em>= <em>z - w</em>(<em>r</em>)</span>，对于液面 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>S</em></span><em> </em>令 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>F </em>= <em>z - f</em>(<em>r</em>) - <em>h</em>(<em>r,</em><em> θ, </em><em>t</em>)</span>，代入式 (23) 且利用式 (24)，导出 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Σ</em></span><em> </em>和<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <em>S</em></span><em> </em>处的运动学条件。</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                               <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/120132qbyk89e888yz3agl.png" title alt="晃动25.png" width="263" height="125" style="width: 263px; height: 125px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                          (25)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 42px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">综上所述，液面晃动问题归纳为以下 Neumann 边值问题：</span></p><p style="text-indent: 42px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"> </span><img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202112/16/120330bvbbvzmawbaauiv5.png" title alt="晃动26.png" width="666" height="259" style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: center; width: 666px; height: 259px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: center;">(26)</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">其中还应包括界面交线 <em>s<sub>c </sub></em>处接触角 <em>θ </em>的边界条件，为避免过多数学推导此处被省略。利用数值方法从上述边值问题可解出 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>ϕ</em>(<em>r,</em><em> θ, </em><em>t</em>)</span> 和 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>h</em>(<em>r,</em><em> θ, </em><em>t</em>)</span> 。若考虑刚体的牵连运动，则势函数<em>V</em>中应增加牵连加速度产生的惯性力势能，且应考虑牵连运动对腔壁<em>Σ</em>和液面<em>S</em>处运动学条件的影响。</span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:24px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 18px;"><strong>5.<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">       </span></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong>液体晃动的等效力学模型</strong></span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">以上对液体晃动的分析仅限于刚体静止或做独立运动条件下的流体力学计算。更符合实际的分析必须考虑刚体运动与液体晃动之间的耦合，理论分析的难度明显增大。1978 年俄罗斯学者 Mikishev 提出用一组单摆和阻尼器的简单模型，作为考虑刚体与液体耦合效应时液体晃动的等效力学模型<sup>[1]</sup>。模型中的固定质量块模拟被刚体带动的底部液体质量，单摆模拟液面的晃动。单摆的固有频率可依据上述边值问题的计算结果。也可利用实验方法，在相同形状缩小的充液腔体的实验中测出液体的晃动频率及对腔壁的作用力和力矩，以确定图8表示的等效模型中固定质量块的惯性矩和位置、单摆的质量和摆长、悬挂点位置等参数。这种等效模型的处理方法适合于在复杂控制系统的工程设计中使用。</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="380" height="383" style="width: 380px; height: 383px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="text-align:center;text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";">图 8   液体晃动的等效力学模型</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">关于充液刚体动力学的系列博文至此结束。有兴趣的读者可参阅系统性论述该领域的专著如[2],[3]，以及国内外近年来发表的丰富文献。</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><strong>参考文献</strong></span><span style="font-family:宋体">：</span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman',serif">[1] Mikishev,G.N. Experimental methods of spacecraft dynamics. Moscow: Mechanical Manufacture, 1978. p.29</span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman',serif">[2] Moiseyev,N.N., Rumyantsev,V.V. Dynamic stability of bodies containing fluid. Berlin: Springer-Verlag, 1968</span></p><p style="text-indent:28px"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman',serif"> [3] Ibrahim,R.A. Liquid sloshing dynamics: theory and applications. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 2005</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">     </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">（改写自：王照林，刘延柱. 充液系统动力学. 第4章. 北京：科学出版社，2002)</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><br></span><br></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span><br></p><p><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span><br></p>                    <br><br>
